plot: A best-selling romance novelist writing under a pen name moves to Portland to cure writer’s block and unknowingly falls in love with the biggest critic of his latest book. When true identities are revealed, both must find the courage to take a leap of faith.
title: A Novel Romance
plot_es: A best-selling romance novelist writing under a pen name moves to Portland to cure writer’s block and unknowingly falls in love with the biggest critic of his latest book. When true identities are revealed, both must find the courage to take a leap of faith.
plot_en: A best-selling romance novelist writing under a pen name moves to Portland to cure writer’s block and unknowingly falls in love with the biggest critic of his latest book. When true identities are revealed, both must find the courage to take a leap of faith.
